attr.title: False Skies
attr.desc: Create a party, layer on new classes, and uncover the mystery behind the seeming reappearance of a long-gone city in this classicly-styled RPG.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://feenicks.itch.io/false-skies) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1830040/False_Skies). Copy the '.rpg' file to the 'falseskies' folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://feenicks.itch.io/false-skies) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1830040/False_Skies). Copy the `.rpg` file to the `falseskies` folder.
